edm.welcome.title: Welcome to TapTap
edm.taptap.text: TapTap is a community and platform designed for you to find new things around video games to fall in love with.
edm.confirm_email.text1: Keep your account secure and enjoy a whole new way to discover superb games.
edm.confirm_email.content_title: Your new hub to superb games
edm.confirm_email.content_text3: Participate in exclusive closed betas only available through TapTap
edm.confirm_email.content_text2: Engage with your community whether it be with other gamers or the developers themselves
edm.confirm_email.content_text1: Discover new games that we personally curate just for you

auth.scope_intro.user_friends_all: Access and edit your friend list in TapTap
auth.scope_intro.user_friends: Access to your friends List in TapTap
auth.scope_intro.public_profile: Access to your profile picture, nickname and gender in TapTap
auth.register.edm.subject: Welcome to TapTap!
auth.register.edm.head.title: Welcome to TapTap!
auth.register.edm.for.gamers.title: For Gamers
auth.register.edm.for.gamers.section3.de: Support games you love by reporting bugs, submitting feedback, and interacting with other gamers by sharing gaming moments.
auth.register.edm.for.gamers.section2.de: Learn more about the games you already own, to keep up with updates and news, and to interact with the developers.
auth.register.edm.for.gamers.section1.de: From cutting-edge cloud games to genre-defining multiplayers, you can choose from a comprehensive suite of games to download and play, or become a beta tester for unreleased games.
auth.register.edm.for.developers.title: For Developers
auth.register.edm.for.developers.section: Instead of building everything from scratch, you can utilize TapTap developer services which cover social networking, community forums, data storage, instant messaging, container engine and much more.
There are over 10 million monthly active users on TapTap. Your game will be experienced by a huge player base who truly care about what you create.
Free to distribute. No revenue split
You don’t have to pay any distribution fee to us. Additionally, there is no revenue split so the entire revenue goes directly to you.
auth.message.unbind: :code (for unbind). valid for the next 15 minutes.
auth.message.register: :code (for registration). valid for the next 15 minutes.
auth.message.login: :code is the code you need to log in. It will be valid for 15 minutes. Ignore this message if you did not make the request.
auth.message.change_bind: :code is the code you need to change the linked phone number and it is only valid for 15 minutes. To keep your account secure, do not share this code with others.
auth.message.bind: :code (for bind). valid for the next 15 minutes.
